mapper.select: select count(*) as count,i.item_text as punish_type from smart_punish_people as p ,sys_dict as d,sys_dict_item as i where p.punish_type = i.item_value and d.dict_code = 'punish_type' and i.dict_id = d.id and p.del_flag = 0 group by p.punish_type,i.item_text
select count(*) from smart_punish_people where punish_id in ( select id from sys_user where depart_ids = #{departId} and user_identity = '2' )

select p.depart_code,group_concat(punish_name) as punishers from smart_punish_people p where p.del_flag = 0 and year(p.begin_time ) = year(NOW()) and month(p.begin_time) = MONTH(date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 month)) group by depart_code
